results.definition: the social force that binds you to the courses of action demanded by that force; every opportunity, an obligation; every possession, a duty"- John D.Rockefeller Jr
examples: we must instill a sense of duty in our children

results.definition: the proper sphere or extent of your activities
examples: it was his province to take care of himself

results.definition: a form of trustworthiness; the trait of being answerable to someone for something or being responsible for one's conduct
examples: he holds a position of great responsibility
